job.title: Signal Software Engineer (TS/SCI with FS Poly Required)
job.description:
If you are a 5 year Signal Software Engineer with a TS/SCI and Full Scope Polygraph, please read on.
We're a small engineering contractor that supports clients in the commercial and government sectors with RF Engineering, Analog and Digital Hardware, Audio and Video DSP, application and embedded software engineering and more. We have offices in Maryland, Virginia and North Carolina and are currently looking for a Signal Software Engineer at one of these locations.
All candidates must have an active, TS/SCI clearance with a Full Scope Poly clearance in order to be considered.
What's In It for You
$100k-$180k/year base salary (DOE)
Full company benefits (medical, dental, vision, short and long-term disability)
401k with company match and more
What You Will Be Doing
Develop MATLAB scrips for demodulation of digital modulation schemes
Develop, maintain and enhance signal processing software like detectors, demodulators and protocol processors
What You Need for this Position
Active TS/SCI clearance with a Full Scope Polygraph
Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field
7+ years of related engineering experience focused on Radio Frequency
Fourier transforms, filtering, digital modulation, error control coding
Communication theory
Signal Analysis tools (WVT, DVT, etc.)
Digital signal processing (adaptive beamforming/filtering, demodulation)
BONUS POINTS
Software defined radio architectures (SCA, REDHAWK, GNU)
Commercial wireless standards
Geolocation techniques
Software configuration tools (GIT)
Python
Eclipse IDE
Model-based design (MATLAB)
LINUX OS
So, if you are a 5 year Signal Software Engineer with a TS/SCI and Full Scope Polygraph, please apply today.
More openings for Software Engineers, Scrum Masters, Network Engineers, Cyber Security Analysts, Database Engineers and System Engineers are available in California, New Jersey, Colorado, Maryland, Virginia and Washington DC.
All roles require a TS/SCI with CI Poly, TS/SCI with Full Scope Poly, TS/SCI with Poly or a Top Secret Clearance.
Email Daniel.Chavez@CyberCoders.com for details.
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Melanie.McElwee@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DC6-1626958 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Melanie McElwee - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
CyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
